channel.title: Why...?
channel.description: Why is there a sudden uprising of moparscape questions on moparisthebest? I don't think we've ever had this many noobs on these forums... Something needs to be done.

item.title: Why...?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“popcorn89, post:8, topic:94451”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=136769.msg1317507#msg1317507 date=1179125519]
You know, it couldn’t be any more obvious that they are not supposed to post here.

If I had my way I’d probably ban them all, lol. I 'spose I shouldn’t go that far though. I sometimes hand out warnings for it.
[/quote]
Why can’t you?[/quote]
Yarlly, i mean they’re disobeying the ToS

Read full topic

If I had my way I’d probably ban them all, lol. I 'spose I shouldn’t go that far though. I sometimes hand out warnings for it.[/quote]

item.title: Why...?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

Bebemycat2:

I’m trying to convince Mopar or Star to sensor the word “Moparscape” from this forum and replace it with “Read the rules www.moparisthebest.com/smf”

That would be interesting

But yeah, its crazy how many topics we’ve had about it. I mean, people have to agree to the ToS before they even enter the forums, the news at the top of the forums has 2 messages regarding posting at moparisthebest.com, the forum description clearly forbids it, and we have two crystal clear, and yet seemingly useless stickies in this forum on the topic. Doesn’t make much sense to me why people simply can’t read.

Read full topic
